DataSift.name: DataSift
DataSift.description:
DataSift Node Client Library

A simple interface to DataSift through Node.
DataSift.author: Daniel Saxil-Nielse (@dtsn)

params.name: version
params.description: Which version of the API to use

classitems.description:
Uses the JSON API definition and for each method extends the `DataSift` 
object with that method
classitems.name: _setupRoutes

classitems.description:
Dispatch the API method

This method uses the definition file in order to validate the endpoint, then
it will dispatch the API method using the `request` node library.

Take special notice of the `TLSv1_method` secure protocol that the DataSift API
uses
classitems.name: _dispatch

params.name: route
params.description: Route information from the definition file

params.name: params
params.description: User defined params for the method

classitems.description: Subscribe to one or multiple hashes

params.name: hash
params.description: A hash or an array of hashes to subscribe to

params.name: callback
params.description: A function which takes in an err, and data object

classitems.description: Unsubscribe to the given hash or hashes

params.name: hash
params.description: A hash or an array of hashes to unsubscribe to
